description: This file defines React-style components for loading skeleton placeholders, specifically for a recipe grid and recipe detail page, using Qwik's component$ functionality.

methods.name: GridSkeleton
methods.description: A skeleton placeholder component for a recipe grid, displaying multiple skeleton card placeholders with responsive layout styling.

methods.name: DetailSkeleton
methods.description: A skeleton placeholder component for a recipe detail page, showing loading placeholders for images and text with styling.
